author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  use authz_read callback in mod_dav_svn locking funcs.
If a request comes in that tries to lock/unlock an unreadable file
path, return FORBIDDEN error.  If a request comes in trying to
discover or detect a lock on an unreadable file path, do the same.  We
can change this behavior later if we wish.
(check_readability):     new helper function to call dav_svn_authz_read().

author: maxb
msg: Fix issue 2162 - Remove doc references to svn:this_dir
* doc/book/book/ch08.xml (svn-ch-8-sect-3-ex-1): WC entries files have not used
"svn:this_dir" for the directory's name for a long time now. Correct this.

author: lundblad
msg: * notes/locking/locking-ui.txt: Tweak example output for svn info on a WCPATH.

author: lundblad
msg: Locking branch: Handle all locking entryprops in the WC.  Implement
"svn info" extensions for locking for WC paths.
fold_entry): Handle lock owner, comment and creation date fields.
Don't store expiration date.  Use new locking MODIFY flags when modifying
